pli-tv-bu-vb-pc47:1.4.10: Kālaṃ āharissathā”ti → kālaṃ harissathāti (bj, pts1ed); kāle harissathāti (sya-all)
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc47:1.4.27.1: catumāsappaccayapavāraṇā → cātumāsapaccaya ... (sya-all, pts1ed); uttari → uttariṃ (bj, sya-all)
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc47:2.2.1: Na bhesajjena karaṇīyena → na bhesajjena karaṇīye (bj, sya-all); na bhesajjakaraṇīyena (pts1ed)
